name: DigitLab
tag_list: social-media, internet-marketing, south-africa, facebook, twitter, linkedin
overview:
This company aims to invest time, money and energy into online marketing concepts and ideas.

We develop internal concepts and consult on online marketing strategies to our clients. We are based in South Africa and intend on focusing our consultation efforts on leveraging South African social market.

The twitter profile @mikeasaunders aims to track social media and internet marketing trends in South Africa.

Our current services to our clients: 1) Internet Strategy and Market Research 2) Social Network Syndication 3) Wordpress Consultation and Management 4) Directory Submission
